noNotifications: You have no notification list yet.
refineTip: Add or remove features to refine and finalize the selection using the sketch tools. This functionality will work across all selection sets.
selectLayerAndAdd: Select an addressee layer and click on the 'Add' button to create a notification list.
selectSearchTip: Search for an address, place, or feature for selection
selectLayerTip: Select features using an existing layer's feature geometry. Choose the selection layer from the dropdown, draw using the sketch tools to define area of interest
selectSketchTip: Select features using sketch tools. Select a tool, draw a shape to define area of interest
listHasSetsTip: For existing notification lists optionally edit or remove each list. Also, refine across all selection sets or export to PDF or CSV.
